text: Shizhe quexin zhu suo jiang shi ta de jingdian, xinshimen ye quexin na bu jingdian, tamen ren ren dou quexin zhenzhu he ta de zhong tianshen, yiqie jingdian he zhong shizhe.(Tamen shuo): Women dui yu ta de renhe shizhe, dou bu jiayi qishi. Tamen shuo: Women tingcongle, women kenqiu ni she you; women de zhu a! Ni shi zuihou de guisu.
